intro.title: Who is Jobloop?
intro.text: Jobloop is a rapidly growing company driven by social entrepreneurs. We have an important mission: to reduce social exclusion by preventing school dropout, qualifying people, and connecting more individuals to work. To achieve this, we collaborate with public institutions, educational organizations, and the local business community. In 2024, we received the FERD Award 'Social Entrepreneur of the Year' for our work against school dropout.
intro.award: Klikk bilde for å lese om da vi mottok FERD prisen 2024

school.title: Programs to prevent school dropout and support education
school.text: In our alternative learning and mastery environments, we work every day to ensure that more students experience achievement, belonging, and meaningful days. We take a strengths-based approach and work closely with each student to help them explore and cultivate their interests. We always collaborate with the student’s school and the Educational and Psychological Counseling Service (PPT) to bridge the gap between our alternative learning environments and the classroom.

work.title: Employment-oriented programs
work.text: Our employment-focused programs ensure that people gain the right skills and are well prepared for working life. Many of our programs include internships, giving you as an employer a unique opportunity to take social responsibility and get to know talented candidates – completely without obligation. If you only recruit through traditional methods, you might miss out on many talented individuals.

partner.title: Kodehode
partner.text: Kodehode recruits candidates who, for various reasons, are outside the labor market and offers training in frontend, backend, and full-stack development, as well as IT operations and support. Through a combination of theory, casework, and practice, participants learn the essentials for a career in IT. Kodehode is Jobloop’s largest employment-oriented program and a leading player in inclusive recruitment within the IT industry. The initiative helps reduce social exclusion and close the skills gap through focused qualification, internships, recruitment, and matchmaking with employers in the IT sector.

quotes.title: What do business leaders say about us?

one.name: John Helge Olsen
one.text: Kodehode has provided us with excellent candidates who are well prepared both professionally and socially. They’ve joined our development teams as frontend developers, working on DNB’s corporate portal for pension clients.

two.name: Hilde Indresøvde
two.text: Our collaboration with Jobloop allows VIS to actively and concretely engage in inclusion. We gain access to skilled candidates through a coordinated, trust-based program with regular follow-up and dialogue. Together, we create new opportunities in working life and explore new recruitment approaches.

three.name: Eirik Sandal
three.text: Elfly Gruppen has had two developers in training for six months. Kodehode has done an excellent job facilitating onboarding and providing specialized expertise and guidance throughout the process. This has enabled us to build an IT solution that contributes positively to the green transition in electric aviation.

kodeloftet.title: Kodeloftet
kodeloftet.text: Fontenehus are voluntary work communities for people who have or have had mental health challenges. In 2022, Kodehode began a collaboration with Fontenehuset Bergen to offer a coding course at the house – Kodeloftet – a three-month course considered a preparatory program for Kodehode.

gloede.title: Gløde
gloede.text: Gløde AS aims to promote work inclusion, competence development, and related services. The target group consists of individuals who need clarification, job training, education, and support to enter regular employment, or who require adapted long-term work. In 2023, Gløde Data and Jobloop began a collaboration for AFT participants. 'Basic Programming with JavaScript' is a 12-week program where participants learn to build websites and apps using JavaScript.

teamwork.title: TeamWork
teamwork.text: TeamWork is a new collaboration project between Jobloop and TeamWork OU AS. It focuses on delivering new concepts to companies to improve the work environment, reduce sick leave, and lower staff turnover.
